title: Documentation on using preferredNodes-ImplicitSnitch for Multi Data Center scenario
description:
SOLR-8146 and SOLR-8522 has been worked on to allow SolrJ CloudSolrClient to have preferred replica for query/read more specifically for multiple Data Center's scenario but there is no/unclear documentation on how exactly this feature can be used and what steps needs to be taken care at SolrJ client side and part of collection configuration/state.

I am offering help to create the required documentation if little more details can be provided.

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: SOLR-8146 is not yet resolved , It does not yet have  a patch
